title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
ting us save him. Per the terms of Mizora's bargain, Wyll traded his own freedom for the life of his father.

If Mizora decides to help:

Mizora was true to her word: she helped us lead Grand Duke Ravengard to safety. We should return to the submersible and speak with him.

Once you have escaped Iron Throne, talk to Duke Ravengard. He is overcome with a lot of emotions regarding his son when he sees him.

Have a heart- your son is a hero. We saved lives here today, including your own. Grand Duke
